item.title: Rubbish bin, 3rd February
item.description:
Next to lamppost No.8 on Bibury Road, Benhall, Cheltenham the red rubbish bin is leaning so badly it is almost falling over onto the ground.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 26 Bibury Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Plastic Sled Dumped at Location, 3rd February
item.description:
The location is the far gate into the Bill Smiley Butterfly reserve on Cleeve Common Road and going towards the common - just before the woods on the left hand side. A plastic sled has been dumped there. Please can it be removed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Cleeve Common, Whittington
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes everywhere, 3rd February
item.description:
This road needs resurfacing completely. Not just the potholes refilling which lasts about 2 weeks before they open back up again. Many lose stones in the road. Needs complete retarmac and leveling.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 13 Northfield Terrace, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large dangerous pothole, 3rd February
item.description:
Pothole has been here for weeks and still not repaired. Tonight I hit this In the dark and my tyre burst. Will be making a claim from the council as you can see a number of previous reports on this website and it has not been repaired
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A436, Birdlip
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping various back lane between Hanover St & Brunswick Street, 2nd February
item.description:
Lot of flytipping on the lane between Hanover St and Brunswick Street, Dunalley Parade end, near 23 Dunalley Parade. Items include sidewaste, fridge, roadworks sign, hardboard.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 23 Dunalley Parade, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 large potholes Hanover Street, 2nd February
item.description:
2 large potholes in road opposite 50 Hanover Street. Both good depth and at least 40 cm wide. This road needs resurfacing not just patching

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 35 Hanover Street, Cheltenham
